name: crc1607_wb_v1_assayapp
displayName: The specific purpose of performing western blotting. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_assaykit
displayName: The title of the kit/biologicals used.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_doe
displayName: date or a rough date when the assay was performed

name: crc1607_wb_v1_performedin
displayName: The biological context of the sample.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_sampleinfo
displayName: A category header for the sample information.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_samplegrp
displayName: A label to categorize the samples, such as "Control", "Treatment", "Disease", or "Healthy". or collection time points, etc.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_sampleid
displayName: Self-defined sample ID(s). Make sure it is the same when entering the sample metadata.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_organism
displayName: The species from which samples were derived.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_sampletyp
displayName: A description of the physical nature of the sample.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_model
displayName: Biological condition of the sample source.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_targetprot
displayName: A category header for the detailed target protein information.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_otcprotinfo
displayName: If not using Uniprot as protein ontology, please add the name of database and protein identifier.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_ptmgroup
displayName: The specific post-translational modifications being studied.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_gelelectro
displayName: Type of gel used for protein separation. If it is not listed or it is a special mix, select "Other" and enter it in the next field.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_listantibodies
displayName: A category header for the detailed antibody information below.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_antibodyname
displayName: Full product name of the antibody. It could also includes target and modification state.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_vendor
displayName: The company that supplied the antibody

name: crc1607_wb_v1_lotnumber
displayName: The unique identifier assigned by the vendor for ordering the specific antibody product.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_detecreagent
displayName: A category header for the secondary reagent used to visualize the primary antibody.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_deteckit
displayName: The commercial kit or chemical system used to generate the final signal.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_imgsys
displayName: The instrument or device used to capture the final signal.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_qc
displayName: A list of the checks performed to ensure the data is reliable.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_relvpaper
displayName: Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_finddata
displayName: (For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where data are store, private repository, etc. (For sharing) path in shared folder, link to public repository, etc.

name: crc1607_wb_v1_notes
displayName: Notes about this experiment. Either for fellow researchers or to the metadata provider in the future.
